thread.section_title: Tomtop 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Tomtop 的点评意见 | www.tomtop.com
thread.title: Max C
thread.title_full: Tomtop 的点评人 Max C

author: Max C
title: Max C
text: I have been using Tomtop for about 3 years now and on only one occasion during that time I had a problem with poor quality Solar Lights. Usually my parcels arrive in good time and in good condition but sometimes a little later than their expected time particularly if Auspost is involved in the delivery. The Tomtop web site is easy to follow and they have a good range of products..Sometimes their English grammar in describing the goods is a little quaint,but the meaning is not compromised. I sometimes order from other sites in China but prefer to use Tomtop because of their reiiability and friendly service.
